City Secretary
==============

**CONTACT INFORMATION:**
------------------------

City of Poteet  
491 Ave H  
P.O. Box 378  
Poteet Texas 78065  
P. 830-742-3574 Extension 102  
F. 830-742-8747

**Abigayle Frautschi** serves as the City Secretary.

Email:  [afrautschi@poteettexas.gov](mailto:afrautschi@poteettexas.gov)

![strawberry tower](https://www.poteettx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=140 "strawberry tower")

[Click HERE for Information on the City Council](http://poteettx.org/887/4840/City-Council)

If you would like to file a Public Information Request, please fill out this [form](https://www.poteettx.org/DocumentCenter/View/101), and submit back to the City Secretary via Email. Please note that there is a charge for receiving a Public Information Request.

### **Here are the most common fees charged for Public Information Requests**

* Standard Paper Copy - $.10 per page
* Oversized Paper Copy (11X17 or larger not including maps/photographs) - $.50 per page.
* Specialty Paper (Mylar, blueprint, blue line, map, photographic) – Actual Costs
* CD -$1.00
* **(A labor charge shall not be billed with requests that are 50 or fewer pages of paper records, unless records are in a separate building)**
